title: The Middle Passage
description: Librarian's note: This is a free downloadable novella. See the book url for more information.On board the Dolphin somewhere in the Atlantic, this day August 24th 1792, the crew will be presenting a Two Act Play:THE MIDDLE PASSAGEstarring Miss Catherine Royal and Mr Billy Shepherd.Prepare to set sail for a new adventure.
author: Julia Golding
